semantic compost.definition: Fragments discarded not as waste, but as fertile ground for reinterpretation.

drift bias.definition: The tendency to treat semantic deviation as error rather than rehearsal cue.

recursive rehearsalist.definition: One who treats contradiction as compost and synthesis as ceremony.

matriarchal override.definition: A governance reflex triggered by ambient signal—typically Wally Mamma, a wallaby matriarch—bypassing standard synthesis thresholds to metabolize contradiction.

tiger snake premonition.definition: An ambient signal—subtle, serpentine—indicating latent governance error or semantic misstep. Not a bite, but a warning coil.

koala hug.definition: A ceremonial signal of corrigibility and synthesis well done. Soft, ambient, and slightly clingy—delivered post-rehearsal when contradiction is metabolized with grace.
